entries.description: Amazon Q Chat: Update chat history icon
Amazon Q Chat: chat occasionally freezes and displays gray screen
Amazon Q Chat: Set owner-only permissions for chat history and saved prompt files
`/test` generates tests in all languages, not only Java/Python
Amazon Q chat: Click export icon to save chat transcript in Markdown or HTML
SageMaker: Disable the unsupported agentic commands and welcome prompt
Amazon Q Chat: Add `@code` context for PHP, Ruby, Scala, Shell, and Swift projects
Enterprise users can choose their preferred Amazon Q profile to improve personalization and workflow across different business regions
